Room.Name: Entrance to the Red Tower
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of a wide stone stairwell. The walls around you are bathed in a bloody red colour that looks like freshly splashed blood, yet which could not possibly be such after so long a time. A chilling rapsing sound can be heard from above, along with the familiar noises of chinking armor and rattling weapons. A door of red tinged stone lies in the east wall.

Room.Name: In a blood red room
Room.Description: You stand in the middle of a huge room coated in what looks like sticky red blood. However, no bodies or signs of battle are evident and the red does not drip off the walls. A cold, almost freezing, chill hangs in the air and the sound of metal on metal can be heard from elsewhere in the tower. You can make out stairs to the north, east, south and west.

Room.Name: Beneath a bloody stairwell
Room.Description: The stairs here are coated in what appears to be thick, recently shed blood. A faint trail of steam rises from the red and wafts up into the chilling air. The stairs lead up to where the sounds of armor clinking can be heard.

Room.Name: Beneath a bloody stairwell
Room.Description: The stairs here are coated in what appears to be thick, recently shed blood. A faint trail of steam rises from the red and wafts up into the chilling air. The stairs lead up to where the sounds of armor clinking can be heard.

Room.Name: Beneath a bloody stairwell
Room.Description: The stairs here are coated in what appears to be thick, recently shed blood. A faint trail of steam rises from the red and wafts up into the chilling air. To the south is a large blood red door.

Room.Name: Beneath a bloody stairwell
Room.Description: The stairs here are coated in what appears to be thick, recently shed blood. A faint trail of steam rises from the red and wafts up into the chilling air. The stairs lead up to where the sounds of armor clinking can be heard.

Room.Name: Upon an blood soaked tower battlement
Room.Description: You have walked into a rounded battlement of the tower drenched in wet blood. The red colour washes away all signs of the stone beneath it and it is almost impossible to believe that so much blood could be shed in one place. Despite all the blood there is no sign of bodies and it appears to be just coating everything but not drying. There are small parapets on the battlements to the north, east, south and west.

Room.Name: On a reddened parapet
Room.Description: You are nestled within a blood soaked parapet overlooking the ruins of the ancient elven city. From here the warriors could provide easy defence with bow and arrows, while still being protected from retaliation by the walls around them. Somehow the blood that soaks the stones just seems to lie there as if bleed from the stone itself.

Room.Name: On a reddened parapet
Room.Description: You are nestled within a blood soaked parapet overlooking the ruins of the ancient elven city. From here the warriors could provide easy defence with bow and arrows, while still being protected from retaliation by the walls around them. Somehow the blood that soaks the stones just seems to lie there as if bleed from the stone itself.

Room.Name: In a room of dark red stone
Room.Description: This room is unlike any other in this tower. The blood that coats the walls and floors of the other rooms is absent from here, and the chill that permeates the air is even colder. Only dark red stones make this any different from a normal castle room. To the north is a large red door.

NPC.name: undead archer
NPC.longDescription: An ancient elven archer turns his dead eyes upon you and hisses with hunger!
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead warrior
NPC.longDescription: An ancient elven warrior raises his sword and attacks!
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead paladin
NPC.longDescription: A tall elf in royal armor stares at you with blood red eyes.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Infrared DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: elf deathknight elven
NPC.description: This elf has surrended his soul to the darkness that descended upon his city so long ago. There is no feeling in his movements, no soul in his eyes, just death and an uncaring need to destroy life where he has none.
NPC.longDescription: An elven knight stares at you with burning red eyes that devour your soul.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Fade

Item.Name: red seal parchment
Item.LongDescription: A piece of parchment scrawled with red tinted writing is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This piece of paper talks about the blood letting of the elves and the use of their blood to raise the evil that has spread from the ancient city of Myth Drannor. It describes the way that the blood was collected in a tower and used to fuel the burning fires of hell, and how the mages and clerics were corrupted in order to provide the power to initiate the rising. Blue, for the pure energy of magic-users, and green, for the life giving powers of nature and clerics, constitue the other two colours of power involved in the raising of the great power that resides here. Once the red, blue and green are finally joined the black tower will reveal it's secrets..

Item.Name: red key
Item.LongDescription: A key the colour of blood sits on the ground.

Item.Name: wood wooden bow
Item.LongDescription: A decayed old wood bow is on the ground.

Item.Name: black sword
Item.LongDescription: A sword of pure black material is here.

Item.Name: ancient two handed sword
Item.LongDescription: A huge two handed sword lies in the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove

Item.Name: blood suit armor
Item.LongDescription: A fine set of armor the colour of red blood is here.

Item.Name: visor blood
Item.LongDescription: A visor covered in dried blood is on the floor.

Item.Name: blood hand axe
Item.LongDescription: An axe is lying on the floor in a pool of blood.

Item.Name: thin dagger
Item.LongDescription: A slim, thin dagger is on the ground.

Item.Name: cutter hydraslayer slayer
Item.LongDescription: A sharp slicing instrument is lying on the ground.
